member.name: M:SICommon.FutureDatedContractsClosePeriod.CreateSQL2
member.summary: CreateSql2 Returns a DataTable of batchContracts. Sql Statement is corrected to remove sql injection. The include/exclude lists for the "In" statements must break out each value into individual parameters/values for the Command. A Dictionary is used to create the parameters and values . The parameters are added to the sql statement and in the Sql Command parameters mapped to their values.
